main event: An unidentified flying object was reported on October 1, 1964, about 1 mile west of Hillsboro, Oregon.
interesting points: The object was approximately 15 to 20 feet long and oval in shape., It floated about 300 feet off the ground emitting a bright orange glow., The sighting lasted several minutes before the object disappeared over the hills., There was no sound associated with the object during the sighting., The weather was clear with no wind at the time of the observation.
